message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to own this incredible product. It's truly one-of-a-kind and I know you'll appreciate its value. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. Given its unique nature, I believe this is a fair starting point for our discussion.

Hello Alice, I appreciate the uniqueness of the product you're offering. However, considering my budget and the value I place on it, I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $1,000,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
